body_html:
Same here, I also find that torch.random generates huge number in multi-gpu setting. So I have to replace it with numpy.random. I also face the segfault when using multi-gpu. Here is the log:

body_text:
Same here, I also find that torch.random generates huge number in multi-gpu setting. So I have to replace it with numpy.random. I also face the segfault when using multi-gpu. Here is the log:

body:
Same here, I also find that torch.random generates huge number in multi-gpu setting. So I have to replace it with numpy.random. I also face the segfault when using multi-gpu. Here is the log:
